item.title: My three scripts
item.dc:creator: @R1ch4y R1ch4y
item.description:
@R1ch4y wrote:

Three scripts are:

Tug ‘O’ War
Typing Terror
Typing Terror (no waits) - only use if you have uber quick PC.

Tug ‘O’ War:

[code]program TugOfWar;

//By R1ch4, of GzP, and SRL, and now Mopar.

begin

repeat;

Sendkeys(‘A’);

until(false);

end.[/code]

Typing Terror:

[code]program TypingTerror;

//By R1ch4 of GzP, and SRL, and now Mopar.

begin

repeat;

Sendkeys(‘A’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘B’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘C’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘D’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘E’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘F’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘G’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘H’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘I’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘J’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘K’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘L’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘M’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘N’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘O’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘P’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘Q’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘R’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘S’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘T’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘U’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘V’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘W’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘X’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘Y’);
Wait(10);
Sendkeys(‘Z’);
Wait(10);

until(false);
end.[/code]

Typing Terror - With no waits

[code]program TypingTerror;

//By R1ch4 of GzP, and SRL.

begin

repeat;

Sendkeys(‘A’);
Sendkeys(‘B’);
Sendkeys(‘C’);
Sendkeys(‘D’);
Sendkeys(‘E’);
Sendkeys(‘F’);
Sendkeys(‘G’);
Sendkeys(‘H’);
Sendkeys(‘I’);
Sendkeys(‘J’);
Sendkeys(‘K’);
Sendkeys(‘L’);
Sendkeys(‘M’);
Sendkeys(‘N’);
Sendkeys(‘O’);
Sendkeys(‘P’);
Sendkeys(‘Q’);
Sendkeys(‘R’);
Sendkeys(‘S’);
Sendkeys(‘T’);
Sendkeys(‘U’);
Sendkeys(‘V’);
Sendkeys(‘W’);
Sendkeys(‘X’);
Sendkeys(‘Y’);
Sendkeys(‘Z’);

until(false);
end.[/code]

Please post any bugs you may come across.

Thanks,
and enjoy!
